headline: Ventas to Participate in Investor Meetings at Nareit’s REITworld 2025 Annual Conference
summary: CHICAGO, December 05, 2025--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") announced today that management will participate in investor meetings at Nareit’s REITworld 2025 Annual Conference (the "Nareit Conference") on December 8-9, 2025.

raw.headline: Ventas to Participate in Investor Meetings at Nareit’s REITworld 2025 Annual Conference

headline: NAV Monitor: U.S. REITs Close November At Lower Median Discount To Net Asset Value
summary: The price-to-net asset value valuations for publicly listed US equity real estate investment trusts rose in November, after two consecutive months of decline. Read more here.
